Preference.android:title: Application information
Preference.android:summary: This app will contain blood bank details.Each blood bank will maintain records for the quantity of blood that has been donated and quantity that has been distributed to hospitals which will be stored on a server.This information will be used to determine places with abundance and scarcity of blood which will reduce the wastage of blood where it is available in abundance
